about_the_game:
Conquero is a 3D turn-based strategy game. It aims to provide players with a fast and fun experience. In addition to fast-paced gameplay, players must conquer the right territories at the right time, develop their armies and buildings through research, hire mercenaries and manage resources correctly, and make alliances with the right lords to become the sole leader of the entire map.

Research - make researches to build or increase army strength

Build - to produce resources build all relevant buildings

Upgrade Armies and Buildings - level up armies and buildings to increase their strength and efficiency

Transform Armies - transform your land units to sea units and vice-versa

Mercenaries - hire mercenaries to fight for you

Resource Planning - carefully take care of resource levels

Merchants - buy and sell goods to provide your realm

Borders - gain most of the lands before other nobles do

Siege - siege castles and towns to conquer them

Disasters - fight with not-curable diseases on crops and armies, fight with wildfires and storms

Diplomacy - send Insult or Compliment letters to other nobles or send gold as a gift

Explore the Ruins - reveal the long-forgotten resources or reveal the iron deposits where you can build mines

Bandits and Pirates - in the woods and by the sea, you might come across tough Bandits and Pirates who'll ask for your gold.

short_description: Conquero is a turn-based strategy game featuring procedurally generated maps. Research, build, upgrade, and transform armies. Plan resources, hire mercenaries, engage in diplomacy, and conquer lands while managing disasters, bandits, and pirates. Explore ruins and siege castles to expand your empire
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
